definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: make bald, or a baldness, usu. (by mourners) for the dead, cf. Rs:Sem. i. 306, 2nd ed. 324 (Arab. Parallels) (NH id. Hiph. shew baldness; Ar. qarah.a wound, make sores, qurh.ah;un whiteness in face of horse (but qara9a be bald, 0’aqra9u bald); Eth. qarha: make bald (rare); Aram. [[קְרַח]], qrah., chiefly deriv. (and der. Meanings); cf. Sin. n.pr.m. [[קרחה]], [[קרחו]]; MI:3, 21, 24, 25 n.pr.loc. [[קרחה]]);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[יִקְרְחוּ קָרְחָה]] [[בְּראִשָׁם]] Le 21:5 Qr (> Kt [[יקרחה]]; ‖[[יְגַלֵָּחוּ ]] cf. De 14:1); Imv. fs. [[קָרְחִי וׇגׁ֫זִּי עַל]] Mic 1:16 make a baldness... for.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יִקָּרֵחַ לָהֶם]] Je 16:6 men shall not make themselves bald for them.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[כָּל־ראִשׁ מֻקְרָח]] Ez Eze 29:18 every head made bald (by carrying load).
